QUESTION
Please tell me the meaning of this dream: I'm on salat in the masjid,but we all are facing not the quibla but givig the back to it.some kids are making noise and i get really mad,so mucht that i broke mi salat and i slap at them on the head saying to them.!get up,get up!and i hold them by the ear and i pull them up.(i know these kids from the madrasa were i'm studing,and because i'm the oldest student i usualy call their atention when they bahave wrong),and some people(in the dream)where looking ay us making salat(their seem to be christians). ------------------------- This is an old dream:i'm riding a bus with a brother both wearing sunna,i hear a girl on the back of the bus asking "what is meswak"?then i grab one and go to tell her "this is a meswak",she call me rasul an i say !!NO!! only prophet Muhammad was a rasul,she then ask me to make a doa for her then wile i meke that doa sh4e get down from the bus.
ANSWER


Share:
1. The dream is a reflection of your mind and the
conduct displayed at the madrasa.

2. The dream indicates the importance of the miswaak
and it being a great sunnah of Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
